channel.title: termux on uweb browser: unlimited power
channel.description: Recent content in termux on uweb browser: unlimited power

item.title: Text selection
item.description: Click the following links to install menus for long pressing the button "link": Search with home screen google Translate bing translate deepL The file "default.select" defines menus for selected text. If no text is selected, the menu item operates on the whole page. Each line of the file has the following format: [Name]:[mimetype]:[command line] [mimetype] specifies input/output for [command line]. It formats as "[input mimetype]/[output mimetype]". [input mimetype] can be the following:

item.title: Tools
Custom file handling
item.description: Long press the settings button, check the option "custom file handling" to enable the functionality. The custom file handling configuration file is "default.filecap", each line of it has the format as follows: [file extension]:[mimetype]:[command line] The "[file extension]" part can have at most two-segment of extensions such as "txt.xz","html.gz". "[mimetype]" indicates the type of "[command line]" output. "[command line]" is same as the one in default.cmds. The most often used replacements are:
